name: Arnold Press (Dumbbell)
summary: Sit on a bench with back support, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height, palms facing you.
Press the dumbbells overhead while rotating your palms to face forward.
Extend your arms fully at the top of the press.
Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position, rotating your palms to face you.
Repeat with control for your desired number of reps.

name: Face Pull (Cable)
summary: Attach a rope handle to a high pulley and stand facing the machine.
Grab the rope with both hands, palms facing in.
Pull the rope toward your face, flaring your elbows outward.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the peak.
Return to the starting position with control.
Repeat for reps.

name: Front Raise (Dumbbell)
summary: Stand with a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs, palms facing down.
Raise one or both dumbbells in front of you to shoulder height.
Keep your arms straight or slightly bent throughout.
Lower the dumbbells back down slowly.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

name: Front Raise (Barbell)
summary: Stand upright holding a barbell with both hands in front of your thighs, palms facing your body.
Lift the barbell straight up in front of you to shoulder height.
Pause briefly at the top, then lower with control.
Keep your core tight and back straight throughout the motion.
Repeat for reps.

name: Front Raise (Cable)
summary: Attach a straight bar to a low pulley and stand facing away from the machine.
Grab the bar between your legs with an overhand grip.
Lift the bar straight up in front of your body to shoulder height.
Lower it slowly back to the starting position.
Repeat with control for your desired number of reps.

name: Lateral Raise (Dumbbell)
summary: Stand with a dumbbell in each hand at your sides, palms facing inward.
Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor.
Keep a slight bend in your elbows throughout the movement.
Pause at the top, then lower the dumbbells slowly.
Repeat for reps.

name: Lateral Raise (Cable)
summary: Attach a single handle to the low pulley and stand to the side of the machine.
Grab the handle with the outside arm and stand upright.
Raise your arm to the side until it is parallel to the floor.
Lower with control and repeat.
Switch arms after completing your reps.

name: Lateral Raise (Machine)
summary: Sit on the lateral raise machine with your arms under the pads.
Grip the handles and keep your back straight against the pad.
Lift your arms out to the sides until parallel to the ground.
Pause, then lower the arms slowly.
Repeat for reps.

name: Military Press (Barbell)
summary: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart holding a barbell at shoulder height.
Press the barbell overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the bar back to shoulder level with control.
Keep your core engaged and back straight.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

name: Standing Overhead Press (Barbell)
summary: Stand upright holding a barbell at shoulder height with an overhand grip.
Press the bar overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the bar back down to shoulder height.
Keep your core braced and avoid leaning back.
Repeat for reps.

name: Standing Overhead Press (Cable)
summary: Attach a straight bar to the low pulley on a cable machine.
Grab the bar with an overhand grip and bring it to shoulder level.
Stand tall and press the bar straight overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the bar back to your shoulders with control.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

name: Standing Overhead Press (Dumbbell)
summary: Stand upright with a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Press the dumbbells overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the dumbbells back down with control.
Keep your core tight and avoid arching your back.
Repeat for reps.

name: Standing Overhead Press (Smith Machine)
summary: Stand under the Smith machine bar at shoulder height and grip it slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Unrack the bar and press it overhead until your arms are extended.
Lower the bar back to shoulder level slowly.
Keep your feet planted and core braced.
Repeat with control.

name: Reverse Fly (Cable)
summary: Attach two handles to the high pulleys and stand in the center of the cable machine.
Cross your arms in front and grab the opposite handle in each hand.
Pull the handles outward and back in a reverse fly motion.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the peak.
Return to the starting position and repeat.

name: Reverse Fly (Dumbbell)
summary: Hold a dumbbell in each hand and hinge at the hips with a flat back.
Let the weights hang in front of you, palms facing each other.
Raise the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top.
Lower the dumbbells with control and repeat.

name: Reverse Fly (Machine)
summary: Sit at the reverse fly machine facing the pad.
Grab the handles with arms extended forward.
Pull the handles outward and back, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the motion.
Return to the starting position slowly and repeat.

name: Seated Lateral Raise
summary: Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Keep your back straight and core tight.
Raise the dumbbells out to the sides until your arms are parallel to the floor.
Pause, then lower the dumbbells with control.
Repeat for reps.

name: Seated Overhead Press (Barbell)
summary: Sit on a bench with back support and hold a barbell at shoulder height.
Press the barbell overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the bar back to shoulder height with control.
Keep your feet flat on the floor and core braced.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

name: Seated Overhead Press (Dumbbell)
summary: Sit on a bench with back support, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height.
Press the dumbbells overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower them back down slowly to the starting position.
Keep your back flat and core engaged.
Repeat with control.

name: Shoulder Press (Machine)
summary: Sit on the shoulder press machine with your back against the pad.
Grasp the handles with palms facing forward and elbows bent.
Press the handles upward until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the handles back down to the starting position with control.
Repeat for reps.

name: Shoulder Press (Plate Loaded)
summary: Sit on the plate-loaded shoulder press machine with your back against the pad.
Grip the handles and push them upward until your arms are extended.
Lower the handles slowly with control.
Keep your core braced throughout the movement.
Repeat for your desired number of reps.
